sections.heading: Collection fee -- Convenience fees.
sections.text:
Effective 5/7/2025

77-7-11.

Possession of warrant by arresting officer not required.

Any peace officer who has knowledge of an outstanding warrant of arrest may arrest a person the peace officer reasonably believes to be the person described in the warrant, without the peace officer having physical possession of the warrant.

Amended by Chapter 302, 2025 General Session
